tool_description: Calculates appropriate ingredient quantities and serving sizes based on number of people, dietary goals, meal type, and nutritional requirements.

base_recipe_servings.description: Number of servings in the base recipe

meal_type.description: Type of meal: breakfast, lunch, dinner, snack, appetizer, dessert

age_group.description: Primary age group: child, teen, adult, senior

activity_level.description: Activity level: sedentary, moderate, active, very_active

dietary_goal.description: Dietary objective: weight_loss, maintenance, weight_gain, muscle_building

error_messages: Invalid serving numbers: Base and target servings must be positive integers.
Unrecognized meal type: Use one of [breakfast, lunch, dinner, snack, appetizer, dessert].
Invalid ingredient format: Include quantities with ingredients (e.g., '2 cups flour').
Invalid age group: Use one of [child, teen, adult, senior].
Invalid activity level: Use one of [sedentary, moderate, active, very_active].
Invalid dietary goal: Use one of [weight_loss, maintenance, weight_gain, muscle_building].
usage: Provide base recipe servings, target servings, meal type, and ingredient list. Optionally specify age group, activity level, and dietary goals for portion optimization.

scaled_ingredients.description: Ingredient list scaled to target servings

portion_size_notes.description: Notes about appropriate portion sizes for the target demographic

nutritional_considerations.description: Guidance on nutritional adequacy for the specified goals
